Michael Stack wrote:
> No such feature Frank. Add it if you need it. Or subclass ARCReader to
> add your header option (This should be easier to do after recent
> refactoring).
> St.Ack

Stack,

I've added a -f=header capability to arcreader.  You can grab the CVS 
patch here:

http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/heritrix/patch.txt

While I was making the addition, I noticed that the -f=nohead 
functionality was broken, so I fixed that too.

Regards,
Frank
